free_text.Learning outcomes: This course deals with the complex problem of seismic evaluation of existing structures; by far more complicated than for new structures. The aims are to:[br/][li] show how and why the analysis methods need improvements to be used in this context.[br/][li] provide an insight of the different retrofitting methods from both technical and design aspects.[br/]
free_text.Content: [li] Particularity of existing structures in seismic context[br/][li] Vulnerability and seismic evaluation[br/][li] Analysis methods[br/][li] Strength and displacement based evaluation[br/][li] Retrofitting methods (design and technology)[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic knowledge in structural design[br/]Basic knowledge in structural dynamic[br/]Basic knowledge in earthquake engineering[br/]

free_text.Contenu: [li] Particularity of existing structures in seismic context[br/][li] Vulnerability and seismic evaluation[br/][li] Analysis methods[br/][li] Strength and displacement based evaluation[br/][li] Retrofitting methods (design and technology)
free_text.Prérequis: Basic knowledge in structural design[br/]Basic knowledge in structural dynamic[br/]Basic knowledge in earthquake engineering[br/]
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: This course deals with the complex problem of seismic evaluation of existing structures; by far more complicated than for new structures. The aims are to:[br/][li] show how and why the analysis methods need improvements to be used in this context.[br/][li] provide an insight of the different retrofitting methods from both technical and design aspects.[br/]
